title: IRL Quest
description: [Due to threats from a bully to get a game item, Ha Do-Wan dies as an unfortunate game shuttle after playing games for a week straight without sleep. At that moment, he respawns in the classroom a week ago... Everything is same as that day. There is only one difference, a in front of his eyes! What? Beat up the bully using the skills from the games I've played?!?!]
author: Lee Joo-Woon
